summary: During the Second American Civil War in 2017, Barb Wire owns a nightclub called the Hammerhead. Things become complicated when her ex-lover Axel Hood, who is married to the fugitive Corrina Devonshire, re-enters her life.
cast: Amir AboulEla|Adriana Alexander|David Andriole|Vanessa Lee Asher|Ron Balicki|Jennifer Banko|Candace Kita|Xander Berkeley|Tony Bill|Alex Bookston|Gil Borgos|Andre Rosey Brown|Mark Collver|Tina Cote|Vinnie Curto|Shelly Desai|Miles Dougal|Ken Forsgren|Darrel Heath|Clint Howard|Neil Hunt|Diana Lee Inosanto|Udo Kier|Henry Kingi|Tiffany Lawrence|Pamela Anderson|Tom Lister Jr.|Marshall Manesh|Temuera Morrison|Jack Noseworthy|John Paxton|Peewee Piemonte|Steve Railsback|Mary Anna Reyes|Jeffrey Dean Rosenthal|Victoria Rowell|Loren Rubin|Michael Russo|Joey Sagal|Diane Shay|Harvey Shield|Louis C. Simon|Rene Stahl|Nils Allen Stewart|Teo|Patti Tippo|Dominiquie Vandenberg|Ai Wan|Diane Warshay|Nicholas Worth|Jack Wright|Salvator Xuereb|Angelie Almendare|Tracee Cocco|Annett Culp|Sarah Krasner|Darin Mangan|Livia Milano|Arthur Tipp
title: Barb Wire
